seriesJson.title: Beyond Vietnam
seriesJson.description: A speech by Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., given at Riverside Church in New York City, April 4, 1967, and sponsored by Clergy and Laymen Concerned About Vietnam.

node.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. speech, part one
node.description: This program presents the first part of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s speech, "Beyond Vietnam."

subject.name: King, Martin Luther, Jr., 1929-1968. Speeches. Selections

node.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. speech, part two
node.description: This program presents the second part of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s speech, "Beyond Vietnam."

subject.name: King, Martin Luther, Jr., 1929-1968. Speeches. Selections
